mapper.select: SELECT meetingroom_no meetingroomNo, meetingroom_content meetingroomContent, createdate, updatedate FROM meetingroom ORDER BY createdate DESC LIMIT #{beginRow}, #{rowPerPage}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO meetingroom( meetingroom_no, meetingroom_content, createdate, updatedate ) VALUES( #{meetingroomNo}, #{meetingroomContent}, NOW(), NOW() )

INSERT INTO meetingroom_reserve( meetingroom_no, department_no, meetingroom_reserve_date, meetingroom_reserve_time, meetingroom_reserve_status, createdate, updatedate ) VALUES( #{meetingroomNo}, #{departmentNo}, #{meetingroomReserveDate}, #{meetingroomReserveTime}, 'Y', NOW(), NOW() )
mapper.update: UPDATE meetingroom_reserve SET meetingroom_reserve_status = 'N', updatedate = NOW() WHERE meetingroom_reserve_no = #{meetingroomReserveNo}
mapper.select: SELECT meetingroom_reserve_no meetingroomReserveNo, meetingroom_no meetingroomNo, meetingroom_reserve_date meetingroomReserveDate, meetingroom_reserve_time meetingroomReserveTime, meetingroom_reserve_status meetingroomReserveStatus FROM meetingroom_reserve WHERE meetingroom_reserve_status IN('Y', 'N') AND department_no = #{departmentNo} ORDER BY updatedate DESC
